Accordion Value Add 
•
Set up the company’s new accounting system as part of the carve-out by conducting extensive User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for all processes in the 
Sandbox environment and partnered with the client to address the anomalies
•
Migrated all historical records from the old system to the new ERP instance, without any data leakage
•
Created SOPs for all the processes and automated the recurring processes to minimize manual intervention and the probability of errors
•
Ensured that AP invoices, AR invoices, and Journal Entries were posted on a real-time basis, thereby improving working capital management
Situation
•
Company was carved out of a PE-owned energy trading software firm. Financial processes were fragmented and decentralized, resulting in inefficiencies. 
Client team did not have visibility into the end-to-end process and hand-offs between the processes were not seamless.
•
Majority of the tasks were executed manually in Excel files which led to redundancy and augmented the risk of manual errors. PTP and OTC processes 
were not real-time, leading to accumulation of AR and AP invoices for processing at the month end.
•
Partnered with the client in setting up new accounting system and P2P & O2C processes to provide a one-stop solution for both these workstreams

solution provider

Impact
•
Streamlined activities categorized as “business as usual” for the client’s accounting team, which helped the team to close books by WD5 (5th Working Day) 
as opposed to book closure on WD10 earlier.
•
Improved AR management and cash flow by real time invoicing and streamlined customer collections, thereby improving DSO by 25% in three months
•
Achieved “Go – Live” on the target date with improved operations and reduced manhours by over 40% for month-end close (MEC)

Order to cash process flow (OTC)
8
Account Manager shares the signed SOW (Statement of Work) received from the Customer
ARR
As per SOW document, Merilytics team identifies the Project type (ARR/NRR)
NRR
Identify the Invoice Billing Schedule i.e., Monthly/Quarterly/Yearly based on 
the payment terms mentioned in the SOW
Create Task (For T&M Projects) & Milestone (For Fixed Price Projects) in NetSuite as 
per SOW.  Sales Order is raised for Estimated Contract Hours
Based on payment terms, the billing schedule for the invoice is calculated 
and added to ARR Schedule (A detailed working file to maintain billing 
schedule for all the customers)
Project Manager provides actual hours spent detail on the project to FC. FC shares 
the detail with Merilytics team 
Based on the ARR Schedule, Sales Order in NetSuite is raised and submitted 
for FC Approval
Update the Sales Order with the actual hours spent on the Project and submits it to 
FC for approval
FC verifies and provides approval for the Sales Order
After Sales Order approval from FC, the invoice is raised and submitted for 
FC Approval
FC verifies and provides approval for the invoice 
Invoice is shared with Customer and weekly payment reminder mails are 
sent post Payment Due Date until the payment is credited
* ARR- Annual Recurring Revenue, NRR- Non-Recurring Revenue, FC – Financial Controller, T&M – Time and Material, 
Enabled establishing the OTC process post migration of the carved-out client
